name: RamayanaQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open ramayana quiz”
”Alexa, start ramayana quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ramayana quiz
des: This quiz had been designed with inputs from my daughter's aged 5 and 9. Play an interesting game of quiz with learn new facts about your favorite epic. While playing the quiz, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next question. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the quiz. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
